thread.title: Jenni "JWOWW" Farley announces pregnancy at wedding
thread.title_full: Jenni "JWOWW" Farley announces pregnancy at wedding - CBS News

author: Andrea Park CBS News
title: Jenni "JWOWW" Farley announces pregnancy at wedding
text:
Jenni "JWOWW" Farley hit wedding guests with some big news on Sunday: She and new husband Roger Mathews are expecting their second child.
Farley and Mathews celebrated with 15-month-old daughter Meilani , who served as a flower girl at their New Jersey wedding. "Jersey Shore" castmates Nicole "Snooki" Polizzi, Deena Cortese and Sammi "Sweetheart" Giancola served as bridesmaids, and Vinny Guadagnino, Paul "DJ Pauly D" DelVecchio and Ronnie Ortiz-Magro attended the celebration.
14 Photos Baby bumps See the celebs seeing stars over their impending parenthood
During the reception, the couple made their big reveal by showing off a huge poster with a picture of Meilani that said, "I'm going to be a BIG SISTER. May 2016."
Farley wrote on her website Monday that the pregnancy was the "hardest secret to keep."
"IT'S TRUE, WE ARE EXPECTING BABY NUMBER TWO!!" wrote the "Jersey Shore" star. "So YES, Meilani is going to be a big sister and we are due in May 2016! HAPPIEST DAY OF MY LIFE LAST NIGHT!! (Well, tied with the day Meilani was born) Married to the man of my dreams and the best daddy to my babies!! Can't wait for you all to see the wedding pictures!"
Farley met Mathews while she was filming the third season of "Jersey Shore." They got engaged in 2012.
Such an amazing feeling to be able to surprise our friends and family!! üçº #comingsoon #bigsister #WowwWedding @rogermathewsnj @intouchweekly
A photo posted by Jenni JWOWW (@jwoww) on Oct 19, 2015 at 8:58am PDT
